(This castanic woman died at the hands of the argons.)

(You spot a piece of parchment in her hand.)

Not much time...I'm growing cold, numb. Whoever finds this, please tell Hekasha of my fate.

My dear friend and colleague—I wish we had more time to debate the mysteries of life. I don't regret my path...but I will miss you.

—Linkia of Kanstria

{@Creature:76#1011} is dead? I...I don't believe it. She always came back—that's what she did!

Blast and damnation. Did she suffer?"I don't think so."

That's something at least. Her studies gave us valuable insights into the argons and their technology.

Please, take her journal. I think she'd want you to have it. You seem like kindred spirits to me.
